column4: hello, i'm looking for some help...i'm installing ubuntu 7.04 on a dell lattitude d620 with the nvidia quadro chipset, and i can't get the native resolution working (1440x900)
hmm anyone have any input on the wide flatpanel issue, not being able to choose the display's native resolution?
i've been all over the web looking at different ways to tweak xorg.conf
you have to configure x.org file, I just configured fine and the monitor works fine
